## IP

```python
#  [0, 65535]
import socket, struct

```

```lua
--ip
function JudgeIPString(ipStr)
    if type(ipStr) ~= "string" then
        return false;
    end
    
    --
    local len = string.len(ipStr);
    if len < 7 or len > 15 then --
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", 1); --"."
    local pointNum = 0; --"." ip3"."
    while point ~= nil do
        if string.sub(ipStr, point, point) ~= "." then --"."
            return false;
        end
        pointNum = pointNum + 1;
        point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", point + 1);
        if pointNum > 3 then
            return false;
        end
    end
    if pointNum ~= 3 then --ip
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local num = {};
    for w in string.gmatch(ipStr, "%d+") do
        num[#num + 1] = w;
        local kk = tonumber(w);
        if kk == nil or kk > 255 then --ip
            return false;
        end
    end
 
    if #num ~= 4 then --4
        return false;
    end
 
    return ipStr;
end
```

IP

#  [0, 65535]
import socket, struct
socket.inet_ntoa(struct.pack("!I", ip))  #  int -> str
--ip
function JudgeIPString(ipStr)
    if type(ipStr) ~= "string" then
        return false;
    end
    
    --
    local len = string.len(ipStr);
    if len < 7 or len > 15 then --
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", 1); --"."
    local pointNum = 0; --"." ip3"."
    while point ~= nil do
        if string.sub(ipStr, point, point) ~= "." then --"."
            return false;
        end
        pointNum = pointNum + 1;
        point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", point + 1);
        if pointNum > 3 then
            return false;
        end
    end
    if pointNum ~= 3 then --ip
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local num = {};
    for w in string.gmatch(ipStr, "%d+") do
        num[#num + 1] = w;
        local kk = tonumber(w);
        if kk == nil or kk > 255 then --ip
            return false;
        end
    end
 
    if #num ~= 4 then --4
        return false;
    end
 
    return ipStr;
end

#  [0, 65535]
import socket, struct
socket.inet_ntoa(struct.pack("!I", ip))  #  int -> str
--ip
function JudgeIPString(ipStr)
    if type(ipStr) ~= "string" then
        return false;
    end
    
    --
    local len = string.len(ipStr);
    if len < 7 or len > 15 then --
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", 1); --"."
    local pointNum = 0; --"." ip3"."
    while point ~= nil do
        if string.sub(ipStr, point, point) ~= "." then --"."
            return false;
        end
        pointNum = pointNum + 1;
        point = string.find(ipStr, "%p", point + 1);
        if pointNum > 3 then
            return false;
        end
    end
    if pointNum ~= 3 then --ip
        return false;
    end
 
    --
    local num = {};
    for w in string.gmatch(ipStr, "%d+") do
        num[#num + 1] = w;
        local kk = tonumber(w);
        if kk == nil or kk > 255 then --ip
            return false;
        end
    end
 
    if #num ~= 4 then --4
        return false;
    end
 
    return ipStr;
end

 `.py` 

```python
uvicorn main:app --reload
```

![1](../../static/Python/FastAPI/FastAPI-2-1.png)

###  `uvicorn.run()`

```python
from fastapi import FastAPI
app = FastAPI()
@app.get('/')
async def first():
    return {'message': 'Hello World'}
if __name__ == '__main__':
    uvicorn.run(app='main:app', host='0.0.0.0', post=8010, reload=True, debug=True)
# 
# uvicorn run()
```

| ----------- | -------------------------------------- |
| app         |  .py :FastAPI        |
| host        | url 127.0.0.1                |
| port        | 8080                     |
| reload      |        |
| debug       |  reload                              |
| reload_dirs |  reload List[str]  |
| log_level   |  info                |

    item_id: str,
    name: str
):
    return {'item_id': item_id, 'name': name}
if __name__ == '__main__':

from typing import Optional
#  + 
@app.get('/items')
async def read_item(
    	item_id: str,
    	name: Optional[str] = None
):
    return {'item_id': item_id, 'name': name}
# nameNone
```

####  `name` 

{% asset_img "FastAPI-5Query Parameters-2.png" %}

### 

```python
# 
@app.get('/items/{item_id}')
async def read_item(
    	item_id: str,
    	q: Optional[str] = None,
    	short: bool = False
):
    item = {'item_id': item_id}
    if q:
        item.update({'q': q})
    if not short:
        #  short == Falsedescription
        item.update({
            'description': 'This is an amazing item has a long description'
        })
    return item

# FastAPI-9Request Body

## PathQueryRequest Body

```python
from fastapi import FastAPI, Path, Query
from typing import Optional
from pydantic import BaseModel
import uvicorn 
app = FastAPI()
class Item(BaseModel):
    name: str
    description: Optional[str] = None
    price: float
    tax: Optional[float] = None
@app.put('/items/{item_id}')
async def update_item(
    *,
    item_id: int = Path(default=..., description='item_id', gt=1, lt=20, example=2),
    name: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description='', min_length=0, max_length=20, example=''),
    item: Optional[Item] = None,
):
    results = {'item_id': item_id}
    if name:
        results.update({'name': name})
    if item:
        results.update({'item': item})
    return results
if __name__ == '__main__':
    uvicorn.run(app='', host='0.0.0.0', port=8080, reload=True)
# item_idnameitem
```
